DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Red and Infrared Lasers in Treatment of Temporomandibular Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of the present study was to evaluate and compare the efficacy of red (600nm) and infrared (800nm) laser therapy in relieving pain and improving the quality of life of TMD patients.
